dialogs.serverError: The request to the server failed.
dialogs.downloadMessage: Generating a file for download may take up to a few minutes. Please wait. This dialog should close automatically when the download has completed.

document.caveat: Experiment with different page templates and ODDs just changing these options here. Please note that not every combination of settings makes sense for every document. For example, a map cannot be produced without coordinates explicitly encoded and processed, and page view assumes page breaks have been marked up. If you see 'the server did not return any content' message, it is usually a sign of such misalignment between encoded data, ODD and page template.

browse.description: Use this app to experiment and try out various ODDs containing processing model instructions. Upload your own files and create a custom ODD.
browse.login: to upload files or see administrative functions (default user: 'tei-demo', password: 'demo').
browse.login-3: to experiment with your own files and ODDs
browse.title: Title
browse.author: Author
browse.confirmDeletion: Are you sure you want to delete the file?
browse.confirmDeletion_plural: Are you sure you want to delete {{count}} files?

test.title: TEI Publisher Demo Collection
test.description: Documents demonstrating various features. The selection is in no way comprehensive but represents a subset of what is possible. Please contribute your own use cases to complement this.

playground.title: Playground
playground.description: A writable collection into which you can upload your own documents for testing.

markdown.title: Markdown Sample
markdown.description: An example of using markdown for static content.

clipboard.copy: Click the icon to copy to clipboard
clipboard.paste: Paste in the input field to test

dts.note: Experimental: access other editions which expose the DTS API

manage.filename: File name of the ODD (without suffix)
manage.title: Title for display
manage.delete: Are you sure you want to delete the ODD file {{file}}?

editor.delete-spec: Really delete the element spec for '{{ident}}'?
editor.unsaved: There are unsaved changes, which will be included in the export! Continue anyway?
editor.denied-message: You do not have permission to save {{odd}}
editor.reload-confirm: Any unsaved changes will be lost. Continue?
editor.use-namespace: Check for using a different namespace than TEI
editor.title: Title

model.delete-model-message: Do you really want to delete the selected model?
model.predicate-placeholder: [Define further conditions that have to be met (in xquery)]
model.template-placeholder: [Define code template to apply to content]

account.user: User account for administrative tasks. The user will be created if it does not yet exist.
account.owner: The user account who will own the app.
account.password: Password for the user owning this app.

index.help: Define the smallest block on which a full text index is created. For documents                         organized into divisions, choosing 'Create on division' is usually best. If there are no divisions, choose 'Create on text'.
index.label: Default Full Text Index

view.help: Choose what is shown by default when browsing text: a single page                         or an entire division. Display by page requires that the TEI is properly marked up                         with <tei:pb> tags.

appgen.label: Default View

template.help: Choose the HTML template to be used as default
template.label: HTML Template

title.help: Title of the app which will be shown e.g. in the dashboard
title.label: Title of the app

appgen.collection: Name of subcollection to hold TEI documents

abbrev.label: Short name to be used in URLs and file names

appgen.uri: URL to uniquely identify the app
appgen.success: Your app has been successfully generated!

annotations.save: Merge and save annotations to TEI
annotations.search-other: Search for occurrences in other documents
annotations.save-other: Search for occurrences in other documents and apply annotations immediately
annotations.download: Save merged TEI to local file
annotations.restore: Annotations made for this document in a previous session have been found. Would you like to reload them?
annotations.confirm-reload: Discard current annotations and reload the source?
annotations.modify: Apply an edit to the base text
annotations.modify-info: Note: this is not an annotation, but will modify the base text when merged.
annotations.permission: Permission denied: you are not allowed to save annotations.

ner.title: Named Entity Extraction
ner.description: Try to automatically find named entities in the text and mark them as annotations.
ner.denied: Unsaved changes found: please store or discard them first.

hints.modify: marked entity of same type but different key
hints.incomplete: marked same type but without key
hints.open-in-tab: Open document in new tab to review

ner.title: Train a Named Entity Recognition Model
ner.not-found: This feature requires the TEI Publisher NER service to be running! Failed to contact the service.
ner.found: Found TEI Publisher NER with spaCy version
ner.name-placeholder: Name of the model to create
ner.name: Name
ner.path-placeholder: Relative path to document or collection
ner.path-info: Enter path to a document or collection to use as training input. Should be relative to TEI Publisher's data root.
ner.lang-info: You may either train a new model for a language or select an existing model to extend below. If not extending an existing model, you must specify a language. Otherwise leave it empty.
ner.language-placeholder: Language to create the model for
ner.language-error: Either a language or a base model are required
ner.model-placeholder: Base model to extend or copy from
ner.vectors: Only copy vectors from base model
